--- title: "Difference-in-Differences" --- # Assignment 1 ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_1a403fd4e94b021439b227c8ddf0997c'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── #> ✔ dplyr 1.1.4 ✔ readr 2.1.4 #> ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 #> ✔ ggplot2 3.4.4 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 #> ✔ lubridate 1.9.3 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 #> ✔ purrr 1.0.2 #> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} data<-readRDS("C:/Users/Marcel/Master/DataScience/data/hospdd.rds") head(data) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} treatment_start<-data %>% filter(procedure == 1, hospital>=0, hospital<=18) %>% pull(month) %>% min() treatment_start ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 4 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} treated_before<-data %>% filter(procedure == 0, hospital>=0, hospital<=18) %>% pull(satis) %>% mean() treated_before ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 3.525383 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} treated_after<-data %>% filter(procedure == 1, hospital>=0, hospital<=18) %>% pull(satis) %>% mean() treated_after ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 4.363351 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} control_before<-data %>% filter(month < 4, hospital>18) %>% pull(satis) %>% mean() control_before ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 3.392509 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} control_after<-data %>% filter(month >= 4, hospital>18) %>% pull(satis) %>% mean() control_after ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> [1] 3.38249 ``` ::: ::: # Assignment 2 ## 1 ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_e48466bea3c4069010bae813573ce0e9'} ```{.r .cell-code} linear<-lm(satis ~ month + hospital, data = data) summary(linear) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = satis ~ month + hospital, data = data) #> #> Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -3.3831 -0.6724 -0.0838 0.5778 5.7881 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) 3.7597212 0.0308145 122.01 <2e-16 *** #> month 0.0720728 0.0055957 12.88 <2e-16 *** #> hospital -0.0175982 0.0008732 -20.16 <2e-16 *** #> --- #> Signif. codes: 0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #> #> Residual standard error: 1.017 on 7365 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared: 0.07208, Adjusted R-squared: 0.07183 #> F-statistic: 286.1 on 2 and 7365 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: ## 2 ::: {.cell hash='08_did_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_e0cbff089467d742797975b334c1cada'} ```{.r .cell-code} linear_factor <- lm(satis ~ as.factor(month) + as.factor(hospital), data = data) summary(linear_factor) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> #> Call: #> lm(formula = satis ~ as.factor(month) + as.factor(hospital), #> data = data) #> #> Residuals: #> Min 1Q Median 3Q Max #> -3.4357 -0.4930 -0.0120 0.4755 4.5398 #> #> Coefficients: #> Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|) #> (Intercept) 3.419332 0.057597 59.367 < 2e-16 *** #> as.factor(month)2 -0.009608 0.030411 -0.316 0.752069 #> as.factor(month)3 0.021969 0.030411 0.722 0.470083 #> as.factor(month)4 0.349354 0.030411 11.488 < 2e-16 *** #> as.factor(month)5 0.343235 0.030411 11.286 < 2e-16 *** #> as.factor(month)6 0.348800 0.030411 11.469 < 2e-16 *** #> as.factor(month)7 0.341444 0.030411 11.228 < 2e-16 *** #> as.factor(hospital)2 0.408566 0.080413 5.081 3.85e-07 *** #> as.factor(hospital)3 0.533625 0.082596 6.461 1.11e-10 *** #> as.factor(hospital)4 0.227510 0.076977 2.956 140.1 on 51 and 7316 DF, p-value: < 2.2e-16 ``` ::: ::: Using the as.factor method shows one coefficient for each month and one for each hospital instead of grouping all together.
